text: The Chesapeake and Ohio L1 Class 4-6-4 was a class of 5 4-6-4 type streamlined steam locomotives built in 1946-1947 they not built new they were 5 out of the Chesapeake and Ohio F Class 4-6-2 but modified to a rebuilt streamlined 4-6-4 locomotives after World War 2 . They were numbered 490-494 and the 5 locomotives pulled fast express passenger trains until the 1950â€™s and only 1 is preserved.
title: Chesapeake and Ohio L1 Class 4-6-4
